Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: The issue with Getting Started on Windows was found. It will be investigated on Monday by ~Artemkaaas . FYI ~sergey.minaev .

Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: The issue was solved by adding timeout after submitting revocation to ledger so assertion failed because of absence some information in ledger during this assertion.

Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: Also we have a known issue: https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/IS-1368
